info.title: F5 Distributed Cloud Services API for ves.io.schema.shape.recognize
info.description: Use this API to forward API calls into the Shape APIs

post.description: Get channel chart data from shape recognize api

401.description: Returned when operation is not authorized

403.description: Returned when there is no permission to access resource

404.description: Returned when resource is not found

409.description: Returned when operation on resource is conflicting with current value

429.description: Returned when operation has been rejected as it is happening too frequently

500.description: Returned when server encountered an error in processing API

503.description: Returned when service is unavailable temporarily

504.description: Returned when server timed out processing request

endTime.description:
the time to we want the channel data

Example: ` "1639008000000"`

Required: YES

Validation Rules:
  ves.io.schema.rules.message.required: true

itemUnit.description:
the unit where the data is represented

Example: ` "d"`

startTime.description:
the time since we want the channel data

Example: ` "1607558400000"`

Required: YES

Validation Rules:
  ves.io.schema.rules.message.required: true
startTime.title: startTime

recognizeValidateSrcTagInjectionRequest.description: Request to verify shape recognize src tag injection
recognizeValidateSrcTagInjectionRequest.title: ValidateSrcTagInjectionRequest

src.description:
Content to be present in customer webpage's source

Example: ` " ``https://us.dev.zeronaught.com/__imp_apg__/js/abc.js`` "`

Required: YES

Validation Rules:
  ves.io.schema.rules.message.required: true
  ves.io.schema.rules.string.uri_ref: true
src.title: Src

url.description:
Target webpage to check src tag injection

Example: ` " ``https://www.example.com`` "`

Required: YES

Validation Rules:
  ves.io.schema.rules.message.required: true
  ves.io.schema.rules.string.uri: true
url.title: Url

recognizeValidateSrcTagInjectionResponse.description:
Response to indicate whether customer webpage has
custom script tag to track devices been injected or not
recognizeValidateSrcTagInjectionResponse.title: ValidateSrcTagInjectionResponse

isInjected.description:
Status about src script tag injected in customer's webpage.

Example: ` true`
isInjected.title: IsInjected

message.description:
The error string if not injected

Example: ` "unreachable"`
message.title: Message
